knimeNode.name: Workflow Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Read the workflow saved from a FSKX file.

fullDescription.intro: Read the saved the workflow from a FSKX file. the default mode of this Node is to execute the workflow from file in headless mode and exposed the output. if the 'Load the Workflow as meta node' option is selected then the embedded workflow will not be executed but it will be loaded to the host workflow as metanode giving the chance to edit it before execution.
fullDescription.option: Location to file. May be an absolute URL, a mount-point relative URL or a local path.

option.name: Load the Workflow as meta node

fullDescription.option: The workflow read from fskx file will be loaded into the host workflow then it can be edited before execution. otherwise the Workflow Reader will execute the workflow from file in headless mode and exposed the output.
